<a name="printPrint"></a>
# **printPrint**
> BaseResponseResult printPrint(printInfos)

一键打印

### Example
```javascript
var Mslpsapi = require('mslpsapi');

var apiInstance = new Mslpsapi.PrintApi();

var printInfos = [new Mslpsapi.PrintInfo()]; // [PrintInfo] | 打印信息集合


var callback = function(error, data, response) {
  if (error) {
    console.error(error);
  } else {
    console.log('API called successfully. Returned data: ' + data);
  }
};
apiInstance.printPrint(printInfos, callback);
```

### Parameters

Name | Type | Description  | Notes
------------- | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
 **printInfos** | [**[PrintInfo]**](PrintInfo.md)| 打印信息集合 | 

### Return type

[**BaseResponseResult**](BaseResponseResult.md)

No authorization required
